posts.post_content:
I have the following T206 Southern Leaguers for sale (prices includes shipping and are underneath each card).   These prices are relatively firm, my email address is [url]agonzdude@yahoo.com[/url].

[IMG]http://img4.sellersourcebook.com/users/113197/img_3216.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://img4.sellersourcebook.com/users/113197/img_3218.jpg[/IMG]
...$100... T206 Bernhard Old Mill *(this one displays a couple of small hairline creases on bottom right corner and a faint but moderate hairline crease in lower left corner. Otherwise, corners only show slight wear, and at the end of the day this card displays  much better eye appeal then the technical grade.)



[IMG]http://img4.sellersourcebook.com/users/113197/img_3219.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://img4.sellersourcebook.com/users/113197/img_3220.jpg[/IMG]
...$75... T206 Greminger Piedmont *(This one displays a slight and faint stain on the front (by his forehead) and a couple of tiny specks of surface wear. Otherwise, NO creases and corners only show slight wear; with much better eye appeal then the technical grade.)



[IMG]http://img4.sellersourcebook.com/users/113197/img_3224.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://img4.sellersourcebook.com/users/113197/img_3225.jpg[/IMG]
...$100... T206 Hooker Old Mill *(This one displays nice corners, NO creases, and a tiny bit of an angle cut; the only slight flaw is a tiny speck of paper loss(?) on the back side (by the bottom left border). Beauty of a card with much better eye appeal then the technical grade.)



[IMG]http://img4.sellersourcebook.com/users/113197/img_3227.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://img4.sellersourcebook.com/users/113197/img_3230.jpg[/IMG]
...$50... T206 Kiernan Piedmont *(This one displays a crease, a small piece of tape on the back side, and a tiny bit of paper loss on the bottom right corner. Otherwise, on the plus side, respectable corners and NO other flaws. )



[IMG]http://img4.sellersourcebook.com/users/113197/img_3248.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://img4.sellersourcebook.com/users/113197/img_3249.jpg[/IMG]
...$35... T206 Westlake Piedmont *(This one displays a couple of creases and some surface wear.  Otherwise, respectable eye appeal for a lower grade card.)



*** SOLD [IMG]http://img4.sellersourcebook.com/users/113197/img_3240.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://img4.sellersourcebook.com/users/113197/img_3241.jpg[/IMG]
...$125... T206 Paige Old Mill *(This one is the best card in the lot with NO creases and two corners with touches and two with slight wear.  Displays a little bit of an angle cut.)

*** SOLD [IMG]http://img4.sellersourcebook.com/users/113197/img_3234.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://img4.sellersourcebook.com/users/113197/img_3235.jpg[/IMG]
...$55... T206 Manion Old Mill *(This one displays some surface wear and a couple of small creases.)

[IMG]http://img4.sellersourcebook.com/users/113197/img_3231.jpg[/IMG]
***SOLD ...$35... T206 Lafitte Piedmont *(This one displays an obvious crease and corner wear. )

[IMG]http://img4.sellersourcebook.com/users/113197/img_3243.jpg[/IMG]
***SOLD ...$45... T206 Smith Piedmont *(This one displays a couple of horizontal creases but is otherwise nice with no other flaws (fortunately, the creases are not by his face).  Solid card with nice corners and excellent eye appeal. )

[IMG]http://img4.sellersourcebook.com/users/113197/img_3245.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://img4.sellersourcebook.com/users/113197/img_3247.jpg[/IMG]
*** SOLD ...$35... T206 Howard Piedmont *(This one displays creasing.)

Lovely Day...

I'll take Sid Smith if available.
PM to follow.

Doug

PM sent on Manion and Paige.

Thank Iggy

Thanks for these two, Iggy.

Doug
